ai-kv15.5:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv15.5:2.4_0: For the defilements that arise in me: these defilements come to an end.
ai-kv15.5:2.5_0: because you have not conducted himself properly;
ai-kv15.5:2.6_0: For by that defilements are ended.
ai-kv15.5:2.7_0: The account of the profession is finished.
